header.title: The best fence installation company in Fremont
bullets: Ergeon is the go-to construction company in Fremont!
Our custom quotes are comprehensive and itemized.
It’s free to create your quote online!
Ergeon's cutting edge technology makes investing in your new fence easy!

Yelp.description: I had multiple fence companies come by for quotes. We ended up using Ergeon for our fence needs. They were very efficient through the whole process. Pricing was very fair. Everyone who came to my house was very polite, professional and all worked very hard. I would definitely recommend them to my friends and family. We will use them again when I need more of my fence done.
Yelp.name: Ron S.
Yelp.title: They were very efficient through the whole process.

Google.description: We did fence with Ergeon. It was simply great working with them. Right from the setup call, price quality and communication, you guys have amazing customer service and ethics. Delighted to work with you.
Google.name: Dheeraj K.
Google.title: We did fence with Ergeon. It was simply great working with them.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
